item.title: Fusion-Guided Multimodal Imaging and Biomarker Platform for Precision Diagnosis
item.description: Deep learning techniques have emerged as powerful tools for medical image diagnosis. However, their application in non-invasive diagnosis remains largely unexplored. Given the limitations of liver biopsy, there is a pressing need for non-invasive methods to accurately diagnose MASH. To address this gap, we aim to develop a deep learningâ€“based, non-invasive, fusion-guided multimodal tool for MASH diagnosis.

item.title: Complement System: Bridging Immunity and Metabolism
item.description: Understanding the Role of the Complement System in Immunometabolism.
